Package de.oth.blocklib.textures

Class Textures

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.textures.Textures
public final class Textures
extends java.lang.Object
Contains various useful default Textures as well as references to global textures.
Author:
Tobias Werner SoSe 18

  • Method Details

    • setDaySkybox

      public static void setDaySkybox​(java.lang.String path, int type)
      Sets the skybox textures
      Parameters:
      path - File path of the skybox to use.
      type - Defining the type of Cubemap to be loaded (depending on layout)

    • setNightSkybox

      public static void setNightSkybox​(java.lang.String path, int type)

    • fillTexture

      public static ModelTexture fillTexture​(UIColor color)
      Creates a 1x1 ModelTexture, filled with a single color
      Parameters:
      color - Color to fill the texture with
      Returns:
      A ModelTexture object referencing a Texture filled with the given color
      See Also:
      #fillTexture(int, int, Vector4f)

    • fillTexture

      public static ModelTexture fillTexture​(int width, int height, UIColor color)
      Creates a ModelTexture, filled with a single color
      Parameters:
      width - Width of the texture
      height - Height of the texture
      color - Color to fill the texture with
      Returns:
      A ModelTexture object referencing a Texture filled with given color
